10859.quoteText:
Analytics

The services contained in this section enable the Owner to monitor and analyze web traffic and can be used to keep track of User behavior.

Google Analytics (Google LLC)

Google Analytics is a web analysis service provided by Google Inc. (“Google”). Google utilizes the Data collected to track and examine the use of Doxy.me, to prepare reports on its activities and share them with other Google services.
10859.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

12507.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

12508.quoteText: Personal Data collected for the following purposes
12508.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

12509.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

12510.quoteText: Among the types of Personal Data that Doxy.me collects, by itself or through third parties, there are:
12510.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

tosdr.case: This service gathers information about you through third parties

12515.quoteText: or external parties (such as third-party technical service providers, mail carriers, hosting providers, IT companies, communications agencies) appointed, if necessary, as Data Processors by the Owner.
12515.title: This service can share your personal information to third parties

tosdr.case: This service can share your personal information to third parties
tosdr.tldr: Full quote: "In addition to the Owner, in some cases, the Data may be accessible to certain types of persons in charge, involved with the operation of Doxy.me (administration, sales, marketing, legal, system administration) or external parties (such as third-party technical service providers, mail carriers, hosting providers, IT companies, communications agencies) appointed, if necessary, as Data Processors by the Owner."

12516.quoteText: Google may use the Data collected to contextualize and personalize the ads of its own advertising network.
12516.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

12519.quoteText: <li>Personal Data collected for the purposes of the Owner’s legitimate interests shall be retained as long as needed to fulfill such purposes.
12519.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

tosdr.case: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations
tosdr.tldr: Additionally, in the same list: "[...]Furthermore, the Owner may be obliged to retain Personal Data for a longer period whenever required to do so for the performance of a legal obligation or upon order of an authority."

12520.quoteText:
Personal Data shall be processed and stored for as long as required by the purpose they have been collected for.

Therefore:

  • Personal Data collected for purposes related to the performance of a contract between the Owner and the User shall be retained until such contract has been fully performed.
12520.title: This service keeps user logs for an undefined period of time

tosdr.case: This service keeps user logs for an undefined period of time
tosdr.tldr:
Full quote: "Personal Data shall be processed and stored for as long as required by the purpose they have been collected for. Therefore:
Personal Data collected for purposes related to the performance of a contract between the Owner and the User shall be retained until such contract has been fully performed.
Personal Data collected for the purposes of the Owner’s legitimate interests shall be retained as long as needed to fulfill such purposes. Users may find specific information regarding the legitimate interests pursued by the Owner within the relevant sections of this document or by contacting the Owner.
The Owner may be allowed to retain Personal Data for a longer period whenever the User has given consent to such processing, as long as such consent is not withdrawn.[...]"

12521.quoteText:
The purposes of processing

The Data concerning the User is collected to allow the Owner to provide its Service, comply with its legal obligations, respond to enforcement requests, protect its rights and interests (or those of its Users or third parties), detect any malicious or fraudulent activity, as well as the following:
12521.title: This service uses your personal information for many different purposes

tosdr.case: This service uses your personal information for many different purposes

12524.quoteText:
Some of the services listed below may use Cookies or other Identifiers to identify Users or they may use the behavioral retargeting technique, i.e.
displaying ads tailored to the User’s interests and behavior, including those detected outside Doxy.me.
For more information, please check the privacy policies of the relevant services.
12524.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

tosdr.case: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

12526.quoteText:
The Owner is allowed to transfer Personal Data collected within the EU to third countries (i.e. any country not part of the EU) only pursuant to a specific legal basis. Any such Data transfer is based on one of the legal bases described below.
Users can inquire with the Owner to learn which legal basis applies to which specific service.

Other legal basis for Data transfer abroad (Doxy.me)

If no other legal basis applies, Personal Data shall be transferred from the EU to third countries only if at least one of the following conditions is met:
12526.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

12529.quoteText:
Managing contacts and sending messages

This type of service makes it possible to manage a database of email contacts, phone contacts or any other contact information to communicate with the User.
12529.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

12540.quoteText: Doxy.me does not support “Do Not Track” requests.
12540.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

12541.quoteText: The Owner reserves the right to make changes to this privacy policy at any time by notifying its Users on this page and possibly within Doxy.me and/or - as far as technically and legally feasible - sending a notice to Users via any contact information available to the Owner.
12541.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

tosdr.case: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
